.. highlight:: shell

============
Installation
============


Stable release
--------------

To install geocube, run this command in your terminal:

.. code-block:: console

    $ pip install geocube

This is the preferred method to install geocube, as it will always install the most recent stable release.

If you don't have `pip`_ installed, this `Python installation guide`_ can guide
you through the process.

.. _pip: https://pip.pypa.io
.. _Python installation guide: http://docs.python-guide.org/en/latest/starting/installation/


From source
-----------

The source for geocube can be downloaded from the `GitHub repo`_.

.. code-block:: console

    $ git clone git@github.com:corteva/geocube.git

    $ cd geocube
    $ python setup.py install


.. _GitHub repo: https://github.com/corteva/geocube
